title: Spinach, walnut & feta fritters with tzatziki

ingredients.item: 2 Waitrose British Blacktail Large Free Range Eggs

instructions.step: Bring a pan of water to the boil, add the spinach and cook for 30 seconds until wilted. Drain and squeeze out all the water.

Roughly chop and place in a bowl. Add the salad onion, walnuts, flour, cumin and feta. Mix well. Beat the eggs and add to the mixture to bind together. Shape into 4 flat patties about 9-10cm in size. Chill while you make the tzatziki.
Coarsely grate the cucumber and mix with the yogurt, lemon juice, crushed garlic and seasoning. Set aside.

Heat the oil in a large non-stick frying pan and cook the fritters for 2-3 minutes on each side until golden. Drain on kitchen paper then serve with the tzatziki. Delicious with a tomato and red onion salad.
